About.AboutCompanyInfoFirstParagraph: Mirai Line Co., Ltd is an affiliated company created with a goal of organizing freight shippings by sea and provide freight forwarding services with help of the largest carriers in Japan.
About.AboutCompanyInfoSecondParagraph: Our company organizes regular shipping by sea of equipment, vehicles, general cargo and more.
About.AboutCompanyInfoThirdParagraph: We provide a full spectrum of services related to shipping cargo from Fushiki, Toyamashinko, Osaka, and Yokohama ports in Japan to the following destinations:
About.WarehouseDescr: Our company has yards available for cargo storage while it's awaiting to be shipped.
